creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: narrow light blue waist band with ties attached to indigo dyed narrow pleats; deep pleats in blue and black; applied to panels are cutouts in several colors outlined colorful stitching; off center PR is inserted section of horizontal stripes and one black section; lower half has blue lining
title: Skirt
